feed.title: Graphback Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Graphback news and events.

entry.title: Graphback - the evolution of the GraphQL ecosystem
entry.summary: GraphQL was created almost 7 years ago at Facebook to resolve specific problems for the Facebook mobile platform. As Query Language, GraphQL offers transport and data exchange layer between server and client, leaving many implementation details to de...

entry.title: Using Visitor Pattern to parse GraphQL AST
entry.summary: GraphQL is a amazing technology which is being adapted more and more. As part of my work for JBoss community in GSoC'19 I have been working on Graphback. For the needs of the project we had to extract information from a schema (SDL syntax) into a nice object we can use. For example, convert this
